Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier.
Reviews.Author: Joel J. Helbig
Reviews.Content: This product more than met my expectations.  I'm not a techno-file, but I think the picture is excellent.  Color is great and the HD feed from my satellite looks awesome.  The sound is a little lacking, but not enough for a four star rating. Games and Blu-Ray movies from my PS3 are almost unbelievable. It takes up a little more space than a plasma or LED, but the HUGE price savings make the little bit of lost space worth it. I would have paid 3X for a comparable plasma.

Reviews.Title: get this now
Reviews.Author: Gretel Foster-boatwright "bargins only"
Reviews.Content: This TV is beautiful at an amzing price. I have been shopping for this model of tv and the price took my breathe away. I would recommend this tv to anyone that wants to see a picutre that is so clear that it is like seeing tv for the first time.

Reviews.Title: fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Donald C. Venedam
Reviews.Content: You just can't find a better TV for the price, in fact one would be hard pressed to find a better TV at a higher price. Love this set!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Faith Sanders "ipxa"
Reviews.Content: The colors are wonderful and the picture is crisp! It's the best TV I've ever owned!! And I got it at a great price! It was worth the research. And the shipping was really fast! I couldn't be happier with this purchase!!

Reviews.Title: A LOT of TV for the money
Reviews.Author: J. Haessly
Reviews.Content: I've been a big fan of DLP TVs since I discovered them - its just a lot of tv for the money, especially considering what you'd pay for a LCD or plasma of the same size. And no one does it better than Samsung. The picture is bright and razor sharp, and the color is great right out of the box, though there are a bevy of menu options if you want to tweak the settings to suit your particular preferences. This 61" is an upgrade from the 46" I've had for 3 years, and it is improved over the 46" in the very few ways that needed any improvement; 3 HDMI inputs over 2, menus are even easier to navigate, there are a few more automatic color options, etc...And these TVs are almost all screen, which means it doesn't just seem big because of the speaker panels and bevels surrounding the screen, it really is huge! When you sit in front of this thing, you feel like you're sitting in front of a movie screen!To say I would recommend this TV is an understatement - you will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: great picture and sound
Reviews.Author: Kevin T. Horton
Reviews.Content: has a great picture has great sound and a great 3D mode for my PS2 game its not as heavy as other big screen tv's easy to move around and has a nice look to it i'm very happy with this tv

Reviews.Title: love this TV
Reviews.Author: Annette E. Rollins
Reviews.Content: Samsung HL61A650 61-Inch 1080p Slim DLP HDTVThis is one of our favorite purchases. The Samsung is top rated in Consumers Report and rightly so.If you purchase - we hope you enjoy as much as we do.

Reviews.Title: Bang for the buck is here.
Reviews.Author: Keith M. Taylor "dragonphire"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, decent but not overwhelming sound quality.  Wise I had gotten the 67 inch just so that I could have more picture. Great set for the price.Updated 10/29/2012:  Still working without a hitch. I will now give it five stars just due to the fact that I have a surround sound and that I found out that none of the other televisions I have looked at recently have good sound either.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG HATES DLP OWNERS
Reviews.Author: S. Donahue "MacMasterShane"
Reviews.Content: In august, i bought a 56" DLP Television from circuit City. shortly after it's installation, it developed a dark spot in the corner. i contacted Samsung for warranty work, and after 4 months of messing around, I'm now without a TV, and they have offered me a base model 46" LCD as an exchange!When i inquired why they didn't offer me a DLP replacement in a similar size and model, they told me there were none. and that my only option was a LCD!i didn't buy a tiny LCD, i bought a big DLP for the picture quality and dark ranges! now the supervisor in Case Management, Marvell Goodgame, won't return my phone calls or answer his phone!I'm furious, and i've had to file a BBB dispute in hopes that can push my warranty claim along!DO NOT BUY THIS TV. SAMSUNG WILL NOT HONOR IT'S WARRANTY IF IT GOES BAD.

Reviews.Title: Great experience
Reviews.Author: C. R. McElroy
Reviews.Content: The seller had to refund the expedited shipping because they don't offer that.  Other than that, it was a great purchase.TV is great.

Reviews.Title: Price Alert
Reviews.Author: R. L. Carr "Wonder Why"
Reviews.Content: First, the Price Alert.... Best Buy will sell this set right now for $1759 !Just ordered one this morning, base on previous model reviews and the addition of 3D capability.  (and I'm surprised the Amazon price is so high!)The salesperson at Best Buy stated that these are on "discontinued status" already.  Apparently they are not selling enough of the BIG sets.  They will continue to stock for the next several months!

Reviews.Title: Bad Purchase Beware!!!
Reviews.Author: Dejam
Reviews.Content: First Off let me just say that when I bought from electronic expo from amazon I had paid for the The samsung tv and extra shipping for the tv.  When my tv didnt arrive at the date it was suppose I called. then this when the fun began fist a woman gets on the phone and tells me that they no longer have the tv in stock and wouldnt know when they would get them in, which made me very upset. Then she said they would give me a 65 inch mitibishi in place of the 61 Inch so i said ok then i asked would i Get the 450 dollers back for the extra shipping since my original tv never came, she said yes , and that she wanted to call back the next day to conform it, i said ok.  I called back the next day then this A## hole got on the phone talking about he didint no anything about that and that me tracking number was wrong and he didnt know about my purchase.  So this is when I really started to get angry and was about to curse him out when his supervisor got on the phone and told me he new what happened and that my tv would take another week but i woulnt get the money i paid for expedied shipping back so at this point I lost money, didnt get my tv, at the right date and time, and i never got the tv a shopped online for, then I had to deal with elextronic expos Sh@it, man they really pissed me off.  They have the worse costumer service i have ever experienced with. BEWARE!!!!
